content: try out this cat coaster pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/dlmt8zc3xq0 skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn -orange -yarn needle -stitch marker -scissors final size -the diameter is 10 cm
